name: Blockchain Starterpack: From 0 to 0.1
description: Learn the fundamentals of blockchain with clear explanations and real-world examples—no tech jargon, just simple and fun.

name: Decoding Ethereum: A Beginner’s Guide
description: Everything you need to get started with Ethereum in one course. From wallets to dApps, we’ve got you covered.

name: Bitcoin Whitepaper: The Starting Block
description: Dive into the foundation of Bitcoin with an in-depth exploration of its whitepaper. Uncover its origins, concepts, and the ideas that powers the first blockchain.
